description: The file defines a front-end component 'NoteEditor' using LightningJS framework. It manages rendering and user interaction for editing notes, fetching note data via external services, and updating state accordingly.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A LightningJS component for editing notes, handling rendering, state management, and user interactions to allow editing and saving notes.

methods.name: $queueAutoSave
methods.description: Queues an auto-save operation with a 600ms delay to debounce rapid changes.

methods.name: $save
methods.description: Saves the current note content by invoking external updateNote service and manages saving indicator state.
